hackathon-description-text: We are excited to announce the 2016 athenahealth hackathon in Austin as part of our

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Executive Director of Technology Innovation, Dell Medical School
Director, Experience Strategy and Insight at projekt202

hackathon-eligibility: : Individuals (18 years of age and older) that are able to attend both days of this hackathon at athenahealth's Austin, TX HQ.
hackathon-rules:
athenahealth and the More Disruption Please program are committed to creating events for the whole community that encourage growth and learning in the health care industry. With this in mind, we’ve created a Code of Conduct to ensure a safe and fun environment for all participants.
We expect our participants to treat everyone with respect, be open minded, have a positive attitude, and encourage everyone to participate. Everyone comes from different industries and has different levels of skill, but it’s this diversity of thinking that could bring us the next big breakthrough in health care.
Most importantly, 
athenahealth reserves the right to take action at its sole discretion, including removing participants from the premises and expelling participants from the Hackathon.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Prize is awarded to the best overall solution.
Prize is awarded to the team that best uses the athenahealth API in their solution.
Prize is awarded to the best inpatient solution.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=800 W Cesar Chavez St, Austin, TX 78701, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: What is the potential impact of the solution, in terms of both scope and size, on the hospital market?
How creative, original, and innovative is the solution? How effective is it in utilizing technology to solve the proposed problem?
Is the business model well thought-out, realistic, and scalable?
How usable, human-centered, and satisfying is the user experience?
What makes this team the right team to solve this problem and bring the technology to market?
How clear and persuasive is the presentation, video, and/or prototype?

hackathon-location-address: 800 W Cesar Chavez St, Austin, TX 78701, USA
hackathon-description-header: Spend a weekend making healthcare better!
